div1.p: Acknowledging declaration of war against Tahuayas Indians.
Stephen F Austin, To the Most Excellent Deputation of Texas.

I am apprized of the declaration of War declared by the Most Excellent diputation to the Tahuayas Nation, caused by their bad conduct and hostile dispositions. I have given notice to the inhabitants to be very cautious, in order to avoid misfortunes on the part of that tribe, or any other that may attempt an aggression
God and Liberty, San Felipe de Austin, May 25th 1824,-4-3.
